content: this is designed for a 23 goose statue materials yarn worsted weight in the following colors - 400 yards yellow 40 yards white 20 yards green crochet hook h 5mm i 5 5mm supplies yarn needle for weaving in ends 3 large buttons for coat ⅞ on sample sewing needle matching thread 2 tiny black buttons frog eyes optional measuring tape scissors pins for holding pieces together during assembly measurements finished measurements jacket measured flat - 9 tall at front x 16 across widest part frog - 3 5 tall x 2 5 across body only hatbrim - 6 25 across gauge - 4 with an i hook = 14 half_double_crochet sts and 9 5 half_double_crochet rounds ______________ email help is available with each pattern purchase please follow snappy tots on your favorites social media sites for giveaways new release announcements events and fun facebook 3 pinterest 4 instagram 5 twitter 6 please check out my other patterns ~ featured sale patterns of the week 7 ~ the rest of my shop for over 500 patterns shop now 8 join my facebook group totally snappy 9 for specials events sneak peeks and giveaways if you have any questions comments or suggestions please send me an email 10 _______________ copyright ©2022 snappy tots aka heidi yates no pattern may be reproduced or distributed in part or whole by any means without written permission graphics and pattern in part and whole may not be used for personal or profit finished products created from this pattern may be sold please include reference to snappy-tots com as pattern source when possible 3 https //www facebook com/snappytots 4 https //www pinterest com/snappytots/ 5 https //www instagram com/snappytots/ 6 https //twitter com/snappytots 7 http //www ravelry com/bundles/specials 8 http //shop snappy-tots com 9 https //www facebook com/groups/totallysnappy/ 10 mailto heidi@snappy-tots com
